pullrequest.title: Include code_check tools in the repo

content.raw: It was motivated by the implementation of the gz11 support and the failure on the Jenkins build [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_common-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/6/consoleFull](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/6/consoleFull) . Reviewing ign-cmake seems like we have support for it but it requires some changes in the build system here and the CI scripts.
content.html: It was motivated by the implementation of the gz11 support and the failure on the Jenkins build https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/6/consoleFull . Reviewing ign-cmake seems like we have support for it but it requires some changes in the build system here and the CI scripts.
